title: MyGroceries Shopping List
summary: Your personalized shopping list. Also available on Android Wear.
description: What is MyGroceries?MyGroceries allows you to create your personalized shopping list. When going shopping, start a shopping session to keep track of the items in your cart.Features• Shopping list• Shopping cart• Search pictures• Material design• Android Wear support
descriptionHTML:
What is MyGroceries?
MyGroceries allows you to create your personalized shopping list. When going shopping, start a shopping session to keep track of the items in your cart.

Features
• Shopping list
• Shopping cart
• Search pictures
• Material design
• Android Wear support
comments: Doesn't do what it says on the label
Very easy to use straightforward app. Works great

A good start for a new app.  Needs a few more features, but the AndroidWear integration is useful.  I know from one of his other apps that this developer is very responsive to feature requests and bug reports, so looking forward to seeing this app develop.
